explanation:
code_hardening: none.
resolve_compilation_errors: Replaced all unqualified VK_* usages with fully qualified java.awt.event.KeyEvent.VK_* constants and ensured all newly used dedicated symbol constants are valid members of KeyEvent.
exception_handling: Retained the existing IllegalArgumentException behavior for unsupported characters without adding new try/catch blocks.
logic_customization: Updated digit handling to use VK_NUMPAD0â€“VK_NUMPAD9, replaced Shift-based punctuation with dedicated virtual key constants for the specified symbols, and preserved Shift combinations for characters explicitly required to keep Shift behavior.
refactoring: Grouped cases logically (letters, digits, symbols, whitespace) while preserving the switch-based structure and existing behavior.
misc: Added minor inline comments to clarify numpad digit usage and preference for dedicated symbol keys; no new custom API calls were introduced.
